long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛡️ Address Antidote: Your Protection Against Crypto Address Poisoning

Address poisoning is an emerging threat in cryptocurrency transactions. Scammers manipulate transaction histories, increasing the risk of sending funds to incorrect addresses. Address Antidote offers a solution to this problem.

🔍 What is Address Poisoning?
Address poisoning occurs when a user unknowingly copies a scammer's address instead of their intended recipient's, potentially leading to loss of funds.

🛠️ How Address Antidote Helps:
• Store and manage frequently used addresses
• Verify addresses before transactions
• Label and categorize contacts
• Identify suspicious look-alike addresses
• Browser integration for convenience

🚀 Features:
• Address saving from web pages
• Visual indicators for address types
• User-friendly interface

🔒 Privacy:
All data is stored locally. We do not collect or store personal information.

Address Antidote aims to enhance security in your cryptocurrency transactions. While using this tool, always verify addresses before sending crypto.

💡 This extension is free to use. Donations to support development are appreciated.

Our goal is to improve transaction safety in the cryptocurrency space.
